remediations_applied.title: Dependency provenance review for trust boundary protection
remediations_applied.description: Added dependency_provenance field to context_pack.spec with author_identity and admission_receipt_hash. Added CNS-0010 constraint.

remediations_applied.title: Content-hash-only fetch restriction
remediations_applied.description: Added AC-0011-05 to REQ-0011 restricting content-hash-only fetches in consumption mode. Added SEC-CTRL-0013.

remediations_applied.title: Typed quantity schema definition
remediations_applied.description: Added typed_quantity.definition artifact kind with cac.typed_quantity.v1 schema. Added CNS-0008 constraint.

remediations_applied.title: NFC normalization requirement strengthened
remediations_applied.description: Strengthened CNS-0005 from recommended to required NFC normalization. Non-NFC strings now rejected.

remediations_applied.title: Emergency override signoff protocol
remediations_applied.description: Added cryptographically bound signoff protocol with input fields, signature format, and verification requirements.

remediations_applied.title: Cold-start recovery protocol
remediations_applied.description: Added state_repair_protocol with offline tooling (apm2-ledger-inspect, apm2-bootstrap-repair). Added INV-0006 for forward compatibility.

remediations_applied.title: Graduated enforcement timeline extended to 8 weeks
remediations_applied.description: Extended rollout from 5 weeks to 8 weeks with data-driven acceleration clause. Updated SLA to 24h during rollout.

contested_items_resolved.title: Bootstrap safe-mode approval
contested_items_resolved.outcome: Bootstrap-safe-mode approved with read-only constraint and audit logging

contested_items_resolved.title: Typed quantity schema approach
contested_items_resolved.outcome: Normative schema reference ($ref to cac.typed_quantity.v1) adopted

contested_items_resolved.title: Graduated enforcement timeline
contested_items_resolved.outcome: 8-week default with acceleration clause (advance if MET-0002 >85% at week 5)

contested_items_escalated.title: DefectRecord incentive structure
contested_items_escalated.recommendation: Pilot positive incentive in single team for 4 weeks before broader rollout

strategic_recommendations: Remediations strengthen P1 by improving feedback loop reliability (24h SLA during rollout)
Remediations strengthen P3 by adding enterprise-grade security controls (signoff protocol, cold-start recovery)

verdict_reason: All 6 HIGH severity findings remediated. 4/5 contested items reached quorum. 1 item escalated to AUTH_PRODUCT (non-blocking). PRD ready for RFC transition.
